title: Replace eBay text banner with image banner and display all three sponsor banners side-by-side

requirements.text: Save the uploaded car photo (rear of a slammed orange Honda Civic) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg. This image will be used as the base for the eBay affiliate banner after the RevGrid logo is incorporated into it.

quotes: use this pic for the eBay link with our revgrid logo incorporated into it matching

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded car photo is saved as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg
The file is accessible from the frontend at that path

requirements.text: In frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx, replace the existing text-based eBay affiliate banner with an image-based banner that displays the generated eBay banner image (frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg). The banner must be wrapped in an anchor tag linking to https://ebay.com/inf/revreel?mkcid=1&mkrid=711-53200-19255-0&siteid=0&campid=5339143418&toolid=80008&mkevt=1 with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'. Display all three sponsor banners (eBay, BullBoost, Enjuku Racing) side-by-side in a single horizontal row, each as a clickable image banner. Style the row consistently with the app's dark automotive theme (dark/asphalt background, equal-width or proportional columns, slim clickable strip). The banners must remain in their existing placement position (between the TopBar and main content area or above the BottomNav).

quotes: Make the eBay link picture like the affiliate links put them next to each other and use this pic for the eBay link with our revgrid logo incorporated into it matching

acceptanceCriteria: The eBay banner is displayed as an image (not text) in the Layout component
The eBay image banner links to https://ebay.com/inf/revreel?mkcid=1&mkrid=711-53200-19255-0&siteid=0&campid=5339143418&toolid=80008&mkevt=1 opening in a new tab
The BullBoost banner image (bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png) is displayed alongside the eBay banner
The Enjuku Racing banner image (enjuku-racing-banner.dim_940x627.jpg) is displayed alongside the eBay and BullBoost banners
All three banners are displayed side-by-side in the same horizontal row
The row is styled with the app's dark asphalt/amber automotive theme
All three banners are individually clickable and open their respective links in a new tab
The banner row appears on every authenticated page inside the Layout component

constraints: Do not change any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths
The eBay affiliate URL must remain exactly: https://ebay.com/inf/revreel?mkcid=1&mkrid=711-53200-19255-0&siteid=0&campid=5339143418&toolid=80008&mkevt=1
The Enjuku Racing link must remain: https://enjukuracing.com
nonGoals: Changing the BullBoost or Enjuku Racing banner images
Adding new sponsor banners beyond the three existing ones

edits: Composite the uploaded slammed orange Honda Civic rear photo with the RevGrid logo (amber/orange text, dark asphalt style) overlaid in the lower-right or center area, add a dark amber-tinted gradient overlay so the logo is readable, final output sized as a wide banner (free-photo-of-rear-end-of-a-car.jpeg > ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg)
